Force fieldÔÉÅ

  • Short range non-bonded interactions
    • Lennard-Jones (LJ) interaction
    • Shift Lennard-Jones (LJ) interaction
    • Linear molecule \(\pi\)-\(\pi\) interaction
    • Generalized exponential model
    • Lennard-Jones and Ewald (short range) interaction
    • Pair interaction
      • LJ9_6 interaction
      • Harmonic repulsion
      • Gaussian repulsion
      • IPL potential
      • Short-range Coulomb potential
      • Script commands
  • Bonded interactions
    • Bond stretching
      • Harmonic bond potential
      • FENE bond potential
      • Polynominal bond potential
      • Morse bond potential
    • Angle bending
      • Harmonic angle potential
      • Harmonic cosine angle potential
      • Cosine angle potential
      • LnExp angle potential
    • Dihedral torsion
      • Harmonic dihedral potential (proper)
      • Harmonic dihedral potential (improper)
      • OPLS dihedral potential (proper)
      • Ryckaert-Bellemans potential (proper)
      • Amber potential (proper and improper)

    • Theory description
    • Non-bonded interaction
    • Bond interaction

    • Dihedral interaction
  • Coulomb interaction
    • Ewald summation theory
    • Ewald (short-range)
    • Ewald for DPD (short-range)
    • PPPM (long-range)
    • ENUF (long-range)
